summary: A test suite that validates custom prefetch behavior for Django ORM relationships, covering ambiguous lookups, deprecation handling, custom querysets, generic and many‑to‑many relations (including through models), reverse relations, attribute caching, and traversal of properties.
business_intent: Guarantee that the custom prefetch implementation correctly retrieves related objects across diverse relationship configurations, preserving expected query semantics and performance while preventing regressions in edge cases.
